goal.ch: 訓練學生具備積體電路設計之基礎。
goal.en: "This course is targeted to advanced analog circuits, such as operational amplifiers, filter and tuned amplifier design. The course also covers digital CMOS logic circuits and some advanced MOS and BJT logic ciruits. Hand-on claculation and intuition of the analog circuit are emphazied in this courses."

outline.ch: Chapter 10.7 回授放大器之穩定性分析與頻頻補償 Chapter 11 輸出級與功率放大器Chapter 12 運算放大器電路Chapter 13  濾波器與諧振放大器
outline.en: Chapter 10. 7  Stability analysis and frequency  compensation in feedback amplifier Chapter 11 Output stages and power amplifiers            Chapter 12 Operational-amplifier circuitsChapter 13 Filters and tuned amplifiers

textbook.ch: 教科書Adel S. Sedra and Kenneth C. Smith “”Microelectric Circuits”” 8th. ed
textbook.en: 教科書Adel S. Sedra and Kenneth C. Smith “”Microelectronic Circuits”” 8th. ed

gradMethod.ch:
依學校行事曆舉行四次考試 (close book) 每次含簡答觀念題與 計算題6-8題; 總分每次100分; 平均60分及格。
如需要線上測驗，考試方式另外說明。
gradMethod.en: "Three examinations will be held during the semester. The total mark is 100 points of each examination, including 6-8 brief and calculation questions. The average score should be over 60 to get the credits."

ch: 系所:限電機工程學系。年級:限四年級。
